snippet: Former Nigeria international midfielder and national team coach Sunday Oliseh is to take over at struggling Dutch second division club Fortuna Sittard in a rare managerial appointment for an African in European football....
lead_paragraph: Former Nigeria international midfielder and national team coach Sunday Oliseh is to take over at struggling Dutch second division club Fortuna Sittard in a rare managerial appointment for an African in European football.

headline.main: Fortuna Hope Sunday Driver Can Find Rapid Road to Success
headline.print_headline: Fortuna Hope Sunday Driver Can Find Rapid Road to Success
